Title: Idolle Ramayana
Actors: Prakash Raj, Priyamani, Achyuth Kumar, Rangayana Raghu
Plot: Bhujanga, a Gulf-returned tyrant and theatre enthusiast, is a known man in his town. His family life isn't the most cordial, given his temperament. He's forced to spend a night and a day locked in an empty shop with a sex worker.
